en.title: Maintenance Message
en.message: InterviewGully app will not be available on 6 Sept 2014, from 7:45 PM to 10:45 PM, and 7 Sept 2014, from 11:45 AM to 3:45 PM. We are upgrading to give you a better app performance. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

en.title: System Check In Progress
en.message: InterviewGully app will not be available on 12 Oct 2014, from 2:00 AM to 4:00 AM. We are upgrading to give you a better app performance. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.
